person:biography.personal-details:content: Julien de Witâ€™s primary interest and expertise lie in the field of data science. Trained as an aeronautic/aerospace engineer, he has over the last 5 years developed and applied new analysis techniques to (1) map exoplanet atmospheres, (2) study the radiative and tidal planet-star interactions in eccentric systems, and (3) constrain the atmospheric properties and mass of exoplanets solely from transmission spectroscopy.
